Canberra Zoo's New Playground

Location: Canberra, Australia
Date: 2/4/2025
Application: playground

Project Overview

Discover the stunning new Rosehill TPV® installation at the National Zoo in Canberra, Australia! Expertly delivered by Bruce’s Playgrounds, the design features a nature-inspired colour palette with intricate animal motifs, seamlessly combining aesthetics and safety.Rosehill TPV® provides impact-absorbing protection, helping to cushion trips and falls—perfect for playgrounds, sports areas, and more. With a lifespan of over 10 years, even in extreme climates, it ensures long-lasting performance.Our unique rubber surfacing solution is available in 21 vibrant colours, making the design possibilities endless!Thanks to &amp; Bruce’s Playgrounds
